title: Graphics card?
body: I was wondering how well an i7, 6700hq, 8GB, AMD Radeon r9 375x would work for league. How much fps would i be getting at max settings. Thank you.

replies.body:
Hey there.

Those specs are pretty awesome! While I can't say for sure what exact framerates you'll see on that hardware, I can definitely say that they'll far exceed our [recommended system requirements](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements) and you'll have no problems running League in all its max shiny settings glory!

Let me know if you have any other questions.
In all honesty, You can run League on the Intel graphics on your i7 lol.
